title: Emerald Radiance Jhumka: The Perfect Blend of Tradition and Sparkle
materials: and Shell Pearls. Accented with real stones in the center
features: Classic Jhumka design with an ornate top featuring a central Emerald and floral CZ surround. The bell-shaped Jhumka boasts intricate latticework and delicate pearl droplets (guttapusalu style variation) along the bottom edge. The design draws inspiration from traditional temple jewelry motifs with a modern, lighter aesthetic. This earring set has screw posts for extra security.
colors: and Creamy White (Pearls). This classic color palette is quintessentially South Indian.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranthi
or any event where you want to make a statement of timeless elegance. Perfect for pairing with Kanjeevaram sarees
description: These Jhumkas offer a modern take on a traditional South Indian design. The vibrant emerald and sparkling CZ provide a luxurious touch, while the Hyderabadi Polish ensures lasting shine. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, they are perfect for long events. The classic design ensures versatility, making them a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
